knowledge.title: PP Ventures Server Down - serve --prefix error
knowledge.problem: PP Ventures returns 000 or PM2 shows 'ARG_UNKNOWN_OPTION: unknown or unexpected option: --prefix'
knowledge.solution:
1. SSH: ssh -i ~/.ssh/openclaw_server deva@100.126.91.55
2. Delete old PM2: pm2 delete ppventures
3. Start fresh: cd /home/deva/Mission-Control/ppventures && pm2 start npx --name ppventures -- serve -s -l 8080
4. Verify: curl http://localhost:8080

knowledge.title: X (Twitter) API Posting Failed - Credits Depleted
knowledge.problem: Twitter API returns 402 error: 'Your enrolled account does not have any credits'
knowledge.solution:
1. Go to https://developer.twitter.com/en/portal/dashboard
2. Subscribe to 'Basic' plan ($100/month)
3. This enables posting via API
4. Alternative: Post manually on Twitter app

knowledge.title: Mission Control Not Accessible
knowledge.solution:
1. SSH: ssh -i ~/.ssh/openclaw_server deva@100.126.91.55
2. Check PM2: pm2 list
3. If not running: pm2 restart mission-control
4. Or rebuild: cd /home/deva/Mission-Control/mission-control && npm run build && pm2 restart mission-control

knowledge.title: SSH Connection Refused on Public IP
knowledge.problem: Cannot SSH via 72.62.231.18 but Tailscale works (100.126.91.55)
knowledge.solution:
1. SSH via Tailscale: ssh -i ~/.ssh/openclaw_server deva@100.126.91.55
2. Check SSH config: sudo grep ListenAddress /etc/ssh/sshd_config
3. Change to 0.0.0.0: sudo sed -i 's/ListenAddress.*/ListenAddress 0.0.0.0/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
4. Restart SSH: sudo systemctl restart sshd

knowledge.title: OpenClaw Gateway Not Responding
knowledge.problem: Gateway shows as disconnected or not responding
knowledge.solution:
1. Run: openclaw gateway restart
2. Check status: openclaw gateway status
3. Check health: openclaw health
4. View logs: openclaw logs --lines 50
